subject: Coaches and Managers
Hockey, Ice
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Pitner helped direct emotionally charged wins over the Soviet Union in the 1960s and took his team to the world title in Prague in 1972.
snippet: Mr. Pitner helped direct emotionally charged wins over the Soviet Union in the 1960s and took his team to the world title in Prague in 1972.
